Payroll Support * Maintain employee payroll records * Track commissions (if applicable to EV sales team) * Process reimbursements * Ensure compliance with tax deductions and statutory payments ### 5. Tax & Compliance Support * Maintain records for GST/VAT (if applicable) * Prepare data for tax filings * Track input/output taxes on EV purchases and sales * Assist auditors with documentation ### 6. Financial Reporting * Prepare monthly financial statements: * Profit & Loss * Balance Sheet * Cash Flow Summary * Track burn rate (especially important for growing EV startups) * Monitor cost of goods sold (COGS) per vehicle ### 7. Responsibilities & Context Key Responsibilities & Skills Student Engagement & Lead Conversion: Proactively engage students, visitors, and walk-in clients through phone calls, online inquiries, and in-person conversations, converting prospects into confirmed clients. Social Media & Digital Marketing: Plan and execute social media campaigns across Facebook, Instagram, and other platforms to generate quality leads and strengthen the WorldMoz brand presence. Creative Design & Visual Content: Design marketing materials, posts, and ads using Canva, Adobe Photoshop, and Illustrator to support promotional and student outreach activities. Website & WordPress Management: Publish and manage content on the company WordPress website, including blog posts, updates, service pages, and announcements. Content Writing (English): Create clear, persuasive English content for websites, social media, advertisements, and student communication with strong grammar and readability. Local SEO & Online Visibility: Manage and optimize Google Business Profile (GMB) listings, handle reviews, update business information, and support local SEO initiatives to improve visibility. Client Communication & Consultation: Demonstrate strong phone etiquette and conversational skills when advising students and parents about education and immigration options. Market Research & Outreach: Identify new opportunities by analyzing market demand, student trends, and competitor activity. Reporting & Documentation: Maintain accurate records using MS Word, MS Excel , and CRM tools, preparing reports on inquiries, conversions, and performance. job_title: Executive/ Outlet Incharge, Operation - Fresh Super Mart
job_description: Executive/ Outlet Incharge, Operation - Fresh Super Mart : Meghna Group of Industries. Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Meghna Group of Industries. Executive/ Outlet Incharge, Operation - Fresh Super Mart Application Deadline : 06 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Dhaka Experience: At least 5 years Published: 26 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Bachelor/Honors Experience At least 5 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Group of Companies, Retail Store Additional Requirements Solid understanding of retail store operations, including inventory management, merchandising, and sales processes. Proficiency in POS system operations, cash handling, and financial reporting. Ability to supervise and support the team to ensure smooth daily store activities. Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to make quick decisions in a dynamic retail environment. Good knowledge of store hygiene, safety standards, and compliance with SOPs. Effective communication and interpersonal skills to manage staff and interact with customers professionally. Willingness to work flexible hours, including weekends and holidays. Responsibilities & Context Job Context Fresh Super Mart, a retail chain shop of Meghna Group of Industries (MGI), is expanding its footprint by launching new outlets at metro stations. The incumbent will be responsible for ensuring smooth retail operations, driving sales growth, maintaining high customer service standards, and upholding Fresh Super Mart’s brand image. The position requires strong leadership, operational excellence, and the ability to manage a compact, fast-paced retail environment catering to high footfall customers. Job Responsibilities: Oversee daily outlet operations to ensure smooth workflow, optimal staff performance, and effective response to customer demand. Drive sales growth by implementing merchandising strategies, executing promotional campaigns, and enhancing customer engagement initiatives. Maintain product display standards in line with corporate merchandising guidelines to ensure brand visibility, organized shelving, and easy customer navigation. Monitor inventory and stock levels through regular checks, accurate forecasting, and coordination with procurement and warehouse teams to prevent shortages. Supervise and develop outlet staff by assigning duties, evaluating performance, and providing training on customer service, product knowledge, and sales techniques. Ensure compliance with hygiene, safety, and quality standards by enforcing SOPs and conducting routine operational inspections. Manage customer service operations by resolving queries and complaints promptly while maintaining a professional and customer-focused approach. Implement loss prevention and financia

Executive Corporate Affairs : Duncan Brothers (BD) Limited Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Duncan Brothers (BD) Limited Executive Corporate Affairs Application Deadline : 05 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Age: At most 30 years Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Salary: Tk. 25000 - 30000 (Monthly) Published: 26 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age At most 30 years Responsibilities & Context Role Purpose To support the Corporate Affairs function by ensuring timely regulatory compliance, licensing renewals, and effective coordination of garden-level legal matters through external counsel, minimizing regulatory and legal risks across the Group. Key Responsibilities 1. Garden Legal Coordination (Through External Lawyer) Coordinate with appointed garden-level external lawyers regarding litigation, land disputes, labour court matters, and other legal cases. Maintain and update litigation tracker with case status, hearing dates, and financial exposure. Ensure timely documentation, case papers, and management approvals are provided to external counsel. Escalate legal risks or delays to Assistant Manager promptly. 2. Regulatory Licensing & Compliance Ensure timely renewal and compliance of all statutory licenses. Maintain a centralized license database. Coordinate with relevant government authorities for inspections and approvals. Ensure zero lapse in statutory renewals. 3. Land & Property Documentation (Garden Focus) Coordinate matters relating to mutation, lease, land tax, sale/purchase, etc. Liaise with land offices, sub-registrar offices, and local authorities. Maintain secure and updated records of deeds, agreements, and land documents. 4. Corporate Documentation & Record Control Maintain structured repository of legal documents, agreements, and compliance records (hard & soft copy). Support preparation and execution of agreements, deeds, and contracts. Ensure documentation control standards are maintained. 5. Regulatory Liaison & Reporting Assist in statutory filings and regulatory correspondence as delegated. Prepare monthly compliance and litigation status reports. Identify compliance gaps and recommend corrective actions. Required Qualifications & Experience Bachelor’s degree in Law (LLB preferred) or related field. 2–5 years of experience in Corporate Affairs / Legal Coordination / Regulatory Compliance. Practical exposure to government licensing processes and land documentation. Willingness to travel to garden locations as required. Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) 100% on-time license renewals. Updated and accurate litigation tracker. Zero penalties arising from compliance delays. Proper maintenance of legal and statutory records. Compensation & Other Benefits
